name: King Uddin
description: I used this to clear a blockage of hair and gunk in a shower waste pipe. It is a wide aperture shower trap and this tool removed the blockage, which was about 30cm past the waste trap, on the first attempt.

name: Rony Islam
description: Brought this for our toilet that gets clogged way too easy. Plungers weren't working but this unusual gadget got the job done, only wish it was a tad longer. It's maybe not the most pleasant thing to use as it can get stuff stuck to it but it still saves the cost of a plumber.

name: Rafik Islam
description: You have to careful to wind in a clockwise manner or the brush will unscrew and block your drain! It was sometimes a bit of a struggle to do this without the coil fighting back!

name: Shafik Islam
description: Been Putting Off Cleaning My Kitchen Drain For Sometime, Just Happend To Notice The Rothenberger Pipe & Drain Cleaning Coil So I Bought One. Well My Drain Was Worse Than I Thought, Black Gooey And Getting Nowhere

name: Alex uran
description: Bought at B&Q to unblock a kitchen sink. As a blind procedure this could not be guided around the U bend under the sink. The obstruction was cleared by dismantling the pipe and removal of the obstruction which was past the bend.

name: Winson Herry
description: Been Putting Off Cleaning My Kitchen Drain For Sometime, Just Happend To Notice The Rothenberger Pipe & Drain Cleaning Coil So I Bought One. Well My Drain Was Worse Than I Thought, Black Gooey.hello world
